wow!  i am so glad we found this place!!!  A security guard from Sagrada Familia told us about this place and even though we had a hard time finding it (since he didn't speak fluent english), we didn't give up and was rewarded with the fresh and yummy seafood at this place!!!each seafood you order, you have an option of either grilling or frying it.  we had calamari (grilled), little lobster (grilled), some small squid (fried), and some steamed shrimp (so sweet!).  the dishes were so good that we went back to order a second round of seafood!!!  I wish we have a store like that in the states!  SO GOOD!!! a must stop in Barcelona!!! i wish we had more time in Barcelona so we could go back to this place again before we left!
